1.NAME: Brain
1.BUGDESCR: Bug gains a chance to dodge attacks.
1.PLAYERDESCR: Causes you to play and buy random parts.

2.NAME: Lungs
2.PLAYERDESCR: Kills you instantly if any future round lasts more than 30 seconds.

3.NAME: Eyes
3.PLAYERDESCR: Prevents you from seeing which parts you're buying at the Surgeon.

4.NAME: Tongue
4.BUGDESCR: Bug regains 1 Health after successfully damaging the opponent.
4.PLAYERDESCR: Makes rare parts harder to find at the Surgeon.

5.NAME: Left Arm
5.PLAYERDESCR: Reduces the selection of parts you can play from before a round.

6.NAME: Right Arm
6.PLAYERDESCR: Reduces the selection of parts you can play from before a round.

7.NAME: Left Leg
7.PLAYERDESCR: Immobilizes your bug for a couple of seconds at the start of each round.

8.NAME: Right Leg
8.PLAYERDESCR: Immobilizes your bug for a couple of seconds at the start of each round.

9.NAME: Stomach
9.BUGDESCR: Bug gains the ability to fire a stomach acid projectile.
9.PLAYERDESCR: Causes your bug to take more damage per hit.

10.NAME: Liver
10.BUGDESCR: Bug regenerates a bit of Health every few seconds.
10.PLAYERDESCR: Causes you to lose Health after each round.

11.NAME: Left Kidney
11.BUGDESCR: Bug gains a shield on its left side.
11.PLAYERDESCR: Reduces the Blood you gain from winning.

12.NAME: Right Kidney
12.BUGDESCR: Bug gains a shield on its right side.
12.PLAYERDESCR: Reduces the Blood you gain from winning.
